controls.title: Identity and Access Management
controls.description: Ensure proper identity and access management controls are implemented for CloudFront distributions

implementation.description: Configure IAM policies with least privilege access for CloudFront operations and implement origin access control (OAC) for S3 origins

controls.title: Encryption Key Management
controls.description: Implement proper encryption key management for data in transit and at rest

implementation.description: Configure SSL/TLS certificates using AWS Certificate Manager and enforce HTTPS-only connections with security headers

controls.title: Data Security and Information Lifecycle Management
controls.description: Protect sensitive data through proper classification and handling

implementation.description: Implement field-level encryption for sensitive data and configure appropriate cache behaviors based on data classification

controls.title: Threat and Vulnerability Management
controls.description: Implement security monitoring and threat detection capabilities

implementation.description: Enable AWS WAF integration and configure security monitoring through CloudWatch and Security Hub

controls.title: Audit Assurance and Compliance
controls.description: Ensure comprehensive logging and monitoring of CloudFront activities

implementation.description: Enable CloudFront access logs, real-time logs, and integrate with CloudTrail for API logging

controls.title: Access Enforcement
controls.description: Enforce approved authorizations for logical access to information and system resources

implementation.description: Configure Origin Access Control (OAC) and implement signed URLs/cookies for restricted content access

controls.title: Transmission Confidentiality and Integrity
controls.description: Protect the confidentiality and integrity of transmitted information

implementation.description: Enforce TLS 1.2 or higher, implement HSTS headers, and configure secure cipher suites

controls.title: Boundary Protection
controls.description: Monitor and control communications at external boundaries and key internal boundaries

implementation.description: Integrate AWS WAF with CloudFront and configure geo-blocking and rate limiting as needed

controls.title: Event Logging
controls.description: Ensure system logs capture appropriate information for security monitoring

implementation.description: Configure CloudFront standard and real-time logs with appropriate log fields for security analysis

controls.title: System Monitoring
controls.description: Monitor system events and analyze for indicators of inappropriate or unusual activity

implementation.description: Set up CloudWatch alarms for CloudFront metrics and integrate with AWS Security Hub for centralized monitoring

controls.title: Contingency Plan
controls.description: Develop and maintain contingency plans for system operations

implementation.description: Document CloudFront disaster recovery procedures and maintain multiple origin configurations where appropriate

controls.title: CloudFront distributions should have a default root object configured
controls.description: CloudFront distributions should be configured with a default root object to prevent directory browsing

implementation.description: Configure default root object (e.g., index.html) in CloudFront distribution settings

controls.title: CloudFront distributions should have origin access identity enabled
controls.description: CloudFront distributions should use Origin Access Control (OAC) to restrict direct access to S3 origins

implementation.description: Create and associate Origin Access Control with CloudFront distribution and update S3 bucket policy accordingly

controls.title: CloudFront distributions should require encryption in transit
controls.description: CloudFront distributions should be configured to redirect HTTP requests to HTTPS

implementation.description: Set viewer protocol policy to 'redirect-to-https' or 'https-only' for all cache behaviors

controls.title: CloudFront distributions should have origin failover configured
controls.description: CloudFront distributions should be configured with origin failover to improve availability

implementation.description: Configure origin groups with primary and secondary origins for automatic failover

controls.title: CloudFront distributions should have logging enabled
controls.description: CloudFront distributions should have access logging enabled for security monitoring and analysis

implementation.description: Enable standard access logs and configure S3 bucket for log storage with appropriate retention policies

controls.title: CloudFront distributions should have AWS WAF enabled
controls.description: CloudFront distributions should be associated with AWS WAF for additional security protection

implementation.description: Create and associate AWS WAF web ACL with CloudFront distribution, configure appropriate rules for protection

controls.title: CloudFront distributions should use custom SSL/TLS certificates
controls.description: CloudFront distributions should use custom SSL certificates instead of default CloudFront certificates

implementation.description: Request or import SSL/TLS certificates in AWS Certificate Manager and associate with CloudFront distribution

controls.title: CloudFront distributions should not use deprecated SSL protocols
controls.description: CloudFront distributions should be configured to use only secure SSL/TLS protocol versions

implementation.description: Configure minimum protocol version to TLSv1.2 or higher in the CloudFront distribution viewer certificate settings

controls.title: CloudFront distributions should have field-level encryption enabled for sensitive data
controls.description: CloudFront distributions handling sensitive data should implement field-level encryption

implementation.description: Configure field-level encryption profiles and associate with cache behaviors that handle sensitive form data

controls.title: CloudFront distributions should have security headers configured
controls.description: CloudFront distributions should implement security headers for enhanced browser security

implementation.description: Use CloudFront Functions or Lambda@Edge to add security headers like HSTS, CSP, X-Frame-Options, and X-Content-Type-Options

controls.title: Optimize CloudFront Price Class Selection
controls.description: Select appropriate price class based on geographic distribution of users to minimize costs

implementation.description: Configure price class (Price Class 100, 200, or All) based on target audience geography to balance cost and performance

controls.title: Implement Efficient Cache Behaviors
controls.description: Configure cache behaviors to maximize cache hit ratios and reduce origin requests

implementation.description: Set appropriate TTL values, configure cache key normalization, and implement cache policies to increase cache efficiency

controls.title: Optimize Origin Request Patterns
controls.description: Minimize data transfer costs by optimizing requests between CloudFront and origins

implementation.description: Enable origin request policies to forward only necessary headers, cookies, and query strings to reduce origin load

controls.title: Implement Content Compression
controls.description: Enable automatic compression to reduce data transfer costs and improve performance

implementation.description: Enable automatic compression in cache behaviors for text-based content types to reduce bandwidth costs

controls.title: Monitor and Analyze Usage Patterns
controls.description: Regularly monitor CloudFront usage and costs to identify optimization opportunities

implementation.description: Set up CloudWatch dashboards and cost alerts to monitor data transfer, requests, and cache hit ratios

controls.title: Optimize Log Storage Costs
controls.description: Implement cost-effective logging strategies to balance compliance and cost requirements

implementation.description: Configure S3 lifecycle policies for log storage, use appropriate storage classes, and consider log sampling for high-volume distributions

controls.title: Implement Reserved Capacity for Predictable Workloads
controls.description: Consider CloudFront security savings bundle for predictable WAF usage patterns

implementation.description: Evaluate and purchase CloudFront security savings bundle if using AWS WAF consistently across distributions
